Pre-Game Insights: New Orleans Pelicans host Chicago Bulls for the season opener on October 24, 2024.
Pelicans finished 49-33 overall with a 21-19 home record, averaging 110.7 points per game last season.
Bulls finished 39-43 overall with a 22-29 road record, averaging 112.3 points per game last season.
Trey Murphy III is out for the Pelicans due to a hamstring injury, while Julian Phillips is day-to-day for the Bulls with rib issues.
